page.shortlink: api client api a5 u math conversion alternatives method

argument.name: unit
argument.description: The unit to find alternatives to.

return.name: units
return.description: List of units the passed in unit can be converted to.

page.description: Get a list of all alterative units that a given unit and be converted to.

discussion.p: This method will return an array with all the units that a given unit of measurement can be converted to.
